page.title: 12The Merger of BCHE AND BAA
page.content: One of the major issues of the day is the Merger of Bath College of Higher Education and Bath Academy of Art. BCHE is based at Newton Park but also has sites at Sion Hill and Somerset Place (both in Bath). Bath Academy of Art has sites in Corsham (near Bath) and Sydney Place (Bath). The Merger is a measure taken by the government to keep the administrative costs low. A lot of people do not like the idea, but the alternative could be the closure of all the colleges. The Art students are losing the Corsham site and moving to Sion Hill. The Sion Hill students are moving to Newton Park. Thus in our survey we found a lot of new building work to accommodate the new students at Newton Park.
